definitions.definition: A large summer constellation of the northern sky said to resemble a snake . It is the only constellation consisting of two parts ( Serpens Caput and Serpens Cauda ) separated by the constellation Ophiuchus , representing the snake handler Asclepius .

main_definition: ( astronomy ) A large summer constellation of the northern sky said to resemble a snake . It is the only constellation consisting of two parts ( Serpens Caput and Serpens Cauda ) separated by the constellation Ophiuchus , representing the snake handler Asclepius .
